name: Fate Changer
description:
Somewhere, someone just like YOU got the power to interfere in others's fates. How could small changes be so meaningful for an existence? Destiny? Consequences? Are you ready to change yours by changing other's?

This is a game made for Art Games Game Jam www.goethe.de/artgames

Developers: 

Bruno Bisogni

Christian Erdelyi

Fernardo da Silva Luz

Ivan Garcia Filho 

Lucas Mendonça

Monique Sita de Pieri

Thiago Dametto
